article: an azerbaijani opposition leader living in exile in the united states on wednesday warned authorities in the former soviet republic they would face a revolt at upcoming parliamentary elections if they continued to ignore the opposition .
abstract: talk to opposition or face street power says exiled azerbaijani heavyweight
